doesittick.warn.1: Does It Tick is installed in this server. If you find your mob farm not working when you are far from it, try to use FTB Chunks / OPAC to claim the chunks of it. You can disable this message in Does It Tick's config
doesittick.warn.2: Does It Tick is installed but FTB Chunks is not. If you find your mob farm not working when you are far from it, try to install FTB Chunks / OPAC and claim the chunks of it. You can disable this message in Does It Tick's config
